channel.title: 1975 Referendum on Join EU
channel.description: Recent content in 1975 Referendum on Join EU

item.title: Reasons for joining and staying in EEC
item.description: On joining EEC Ted Heath Ted Heath makes clear in December 1972 that we are joining something that is far more than a common market. Harold Wilson “The lead Britain can give rests on the fact that we are a world-minded people. Britain will give a lead in political attitudes and political developments in Europe. We cannot do that by taking our bat home and sinking into an off-shore island mentality”
